product_name: Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Hidden Pocket
long_description: The Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Hidden Pocket combats potential ID theft by blocking access to personal data stored on embedded microchips while keeping documents, credit cards and ID close at hand. Special technology helps block unauthorized scanning of RFID (radio frequency identification) chips inside passports and credit and debit cards. The Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Hidden Pocket slips onto your belt and conveniently tucks into the waistband of your pants. Belt loops in black and coffee help blend with belt color. The Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Hidden Pocket has a main pocket with two mesh pockets for organization of passport and currency. Durable and lightweight nylon ripstop with moisture-wicking and breathable back panel.
short_description: The Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Hidden Pocket combats potential ID theft by blocking access to personal data stored on embedded microchips while keeping documents, credit cards and ID close at hand.
